title: Nmoder Midi Dresses for Women A-Line Fit and Flare Dress 3/4 Sleeve V Neck Cocktail Wedding Guest Work Dress with Pockets
description: 【DEDICATED TO COMFORT】 The womens midi dress is made of 92% polyester and 8% spandex. High quality stretchy fabric with a nice drape effect, not easy to wrinkle.
【HUGS YOUR CURVES 】The A-line dress is designed to accentuates your waistline and body proportions, while the women's dress falls to the knee for a sophisticated allure.
【FIT AND FLARE DRESS】Designed by a skilled team, this church dress features 3/4 sleeves, V-neckline, medium length, high-waisted design, impeccable hemline, tailored silhouette, and discreet pockets.

【STUNING MIX & MATCH】The fit and flare dress is perfect for any occasions like weddings, funerals, cocktail and church . Elevate your look with this stunning vintage dress paired with handbags, jeweled necklaces and heels.
【CHOOSE THE RIGHT SIZE】The stylish 3/4 sleeve dress for women have size M-3XL, please check the size chart in the description. If you are between sizes, please choose the bigger size.
